system.description: You know the art of hammering coarse iron into lethal blades, horseshoes and more.
system.basicAction: You can use the MAKIN’ ability to make and repair any metal tool or melee weapon with normal stats.
system.advAction: You can make high-quality metal melee weapons. For each success after the first on your MAKIN’ test you can add a weapon quality of your choice. This can be used to add new qualities to existing weapons.
